name: CONTINUE
description: Cut and delete your way through a chaotic computer world filled with programs. Every program has a purpose, but what is yours?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium CPU G3258 @ 3.20GHz dual core or an equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 640 or AMD Radeon 5670 DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Sure
